name: Conqueror's Awakening
description:
Upon Awakening Conqueror's Haki.
  • Your starting Conqueror's Range is 20 ft.
  • You gain Conqueror’s Will for free automatically
  • You gain Conqueror's Roar

name: Conqueror's Will
description:
Gain access to Conqueror’s Roar ability

As an action you roll a charisma check + character level. Everyone within your range will contest it with a similar check of their own. Meaning they also add their total lvl to the check. Depending on their lvl this will have different results:
  • 5+ lvls lower than yours: gets knocked out (unconscious) for 1 round on success. Fail= hit points drop to 0
  • in between: On success they lose half movement speed for 1 round, on a fail they get restrained until your next turn ends and frightened for 1d4 turns. This condition can’t be dispelled or resisted
  • 4+ lvls higher than yours: Success: unaffected. Fail: they get frightened for 1d4 turns.

    You can do this (proficiency bonus) times per long rest. You can double your range with this ability by rolling with disadvantage (if you didn't already have it).

name: Conqueror's Color
description:
Gain access to the Conqueror’s Coating ability

Gain access to the Conqueror’s Roar Upgrade I

Conquerors's Coating
  • Once per round when you make a melee/ranged attack or you are hit by an attack you can roll charisma check + character level for the damage or block. If melee attacking, you gain 5ft reach on your attack. If ranged attacking, the target must be within your CoC Range. (Can NOT be used at the same time as Armament and Observation skills) You can do this (proficiency bonus) times per long rest
Conqueror's Roar Upgrade I
  • When you use Conqueror’s Roar, any beast, plant or creature with Int 3 or less must make its save with disadvantage.

name: Conqueror's Soul
description:
Gain access to the Conqueror’s Coating Upgrade I

Gain access to the Conqueror’s Roar Upgrade II

Conquerors's Coating Upgrade I
  • Now if you are using Conqueror’s Coating and melee attacking, you gain 10ft reach on your attack instead of 5.
Conqueror's Roar Upgrade I
  • When you use Conqueror’s Roar, any beast, monstrosity, plant or creature with Int 5 or less must make its save with disadvantage and you now gain advantage against that creature. If it fails, it immediately becomes Frightened and its hostile intent stops (it will flee or disengage rather than fight, with the possibility of being friendly/neutral).

name: Conqueror's Spirit
description:
Gain access to the Conqueror’s Coating Upgrade II

Gain access to the Conqueror’s Roar Upgrade III

Conquerors's Coating Upgrade II
  • when using Conquerors's Coating, when you roll the charisma check for damage, you can now instead roll (2d20 + CHA mod + character level + Prof bonus)
Conqueror's Roar Upgrade III
  • When using Beast Tamer you now have advantage on the check.

name: Indomitable Spirit
description: You can use this (proficiency bonus + cha mod) times per day

name: Mental Advantage
description: You learn to impose your will over others and can choose to reroll any mental saving throw (int/wis/cha) that you failed, once per day.

name: Strong Will
description: You can add 1d4 to your Conqueror’s Roar , Conquerors's Coating  and contested Conqueror’s checks  and CoC CHA saving throws.

name: Better Control
description: You can target creatures within range (instead of hitting everyone)

name: Defiant Will
description: People of higher lvls are now affected a little bit by Conqueror's Roar.  If they fail, they gain disadvantage on their attacks and lose 10 ft movement speed until your next turn ends

name: Hasty Determination
description: You can use Conqueror’s Roar as a bonus action

name: Emperor’s March
description: After using Conqueror's Roar, you can move up to 30 ft without provoking opportunity attacks.

name: King's Spirit
description: You can now recover half of your uses of Conqueror’s Roar and Conqueror's Coating on a short rest.

name: Expert's Advantage
description: You can now reroll any saving throw once per day

name: Tremendous Will
description: You can add 1d6 to your Conqueror’s Roar, Conquerors' Coating and contested Conqueror’s checks  and CoC CHA saving throws.. (stacks with Strong Will)

name: Unrelenting Power
description: You can now use Conquerors's Coating up to two times per round

name: Conqueror’s Clash
description:
you can use Conqueror’s Roar or Conquerors's Coating as a Reaction.
  • If you are doing this in response to an opposing Conqueror’s Roar/Coating attack, you gain advantage on the roll. It also causes a shockwave blast half your CoC range around you, knocking creatures prone or pushing them back.

name: Haki Convergence
description: when using Conqueror’s Coating you can now use it at the same time as armament and observation haki.

name: Last Breathe
description: Once per long rest, when you hit 0 HP, you instead drop to 1 HP and gain temporary HP equal to your Haki Level + Con modifier.

name: Unwavering Spirit
description: You can use Conqueror’s Roar and Conquerors's Coating (proficency bonus x 2) times per long rest.

name: Universal Advantage
description: You can now reroll any saving throw twice per day

name: Overwhelming Will
description: You can add 1d8 to your Conqueror’s Roar, Conquerors's Coating, contested Conqueror’s checks and CoC CHA saving throws. (stacks with Strong Will & Tremendous Will)

name: Unlimited Power
description: as a reaction you can now use Conquerors's Coating on all your attacks/blocks each round.

name: Conqueror’s Denial
description: Using your Conqueror’s Roar you can block Observation haki from affecting you for 1d4 rounds

name: Supreme Aura (pre-wifi haki)
description: You can speak your intention to others within your CoC range telepathically, as your will conveys your intention.

name: Destructive Will
description:
From now on when you use Conqueror’s Coating, your will has physical effects on your surroundings, such as;

all creatures within 1/4 of your CoC Range (rounded up to the nearest 5) are hit by your Conquorer's Haki damage and make a DEX or CHA save. (can choose if you have Better Control)

On Success take half damage. On Fail take full damage and they are frightened until the start of your next turn. This works with Conqueror’s Clash and the shockwave can use the range from Destructive Will if the range is further.

cracking structures, dealing half CoC haki damage to structures, when using Conqueror’s Roar and Conqueror’s Coating)

name: Undying Spirit
description: When you roll a Nat 20 on attack rolls or saving throws, you now restore a use of Conqueror’s Roar OR Conquerors's Coating (not both)

name: Legendary Advantage
description: You can now choose to succeed on a failed saving throw instead of rerolling it with Mental Advantage, Expert Advantage, or Universal Advantage once per long rest

name: Absolute Will
description: You can add 1d10 to your Conqueror’s Roar, Conquerors's Coating, contested Conqueror’s checks and CoC CHA saving throws. (stacks with Strong Will, Tremendous Will & Overwhelming Will)

name: Infinite Power
description: As a free action, you can now use Conquerors's Coating on all your attacks/blocks each round (assuming you have uses).

name: Sovereign's Word
description: You can speak to others within your CoC range telepathically, as your will conveys your message.

name: Supreme Will
description:
From now on when you use Conqueror’s Coating, your will has physical effects on your surroundings, such as;

all creatures within 1/2 of your CoC Range are hit by your Conqueror's Haki damage and make a DEX or CHA save. (can choose if you have Better Control)

On Success take half damage. On Fail take full damage and they are frightened until the start of your next turn.

You can use Conqueror’s Roar at half your CoC haki range at the same time.

name: Devil's Bane
description: You learn to cancel some devil fruit effects when you use your Conqueror’s Roar or Conquerors's Coating. To cancel one; roll a Conqueror’s check contested by a check of theirs (both still add level to the check). If you win, the devil fruit ability of your choosing ends and is locked until your next turn ends. (can do this prof bonus times per day.)

name: Devil's Binding
description: the duration of Devil’s Bane increases to 1d4 rounds

name: Devil's Burden
description: the duration of Devil’s Bane increases to 1d6 rounds

name: Devil's Blight
description: the duration of Devil’s Bane increases to 1d8 rounds

name: CoC Range I
description: Your Conqueror's Range increases to 30ft.

name: CoC Range II
description: Your Conqueror's Range increases to 40ft.

name: CoC Range III
description: Your Conqueror's Range increases to 50ft.

name: CoC Range IV
description: Your Conqueror's Range increases to 60ft.

name: CoC Range V
description: Your Conqueror's Range increases to 70ft.

name: CoC Range VI
description: Your Conqueror's Range increases to 80ft.

name: CoC Range VII
description: Your Conqueror's Range increases to 90ft.

name: CoC Range VII
description: Your Conqueror's Range increases to 100ft.

name: Extended Range I
description: Your Conqueror's Range multiplies times 2

name: Extended Range II
description: Your Conqueror's Range multiplies times 3

name: Extended Range III
description: Your Conqueror's Range multiplies times 4

name: Extended Range IV
description: Your Conqueror's Range multiplies times 5
